docs.title: About Me
docs.text: I am currently a Ph.D. student at University of Toronto, adviced by Prof. Xujie Si, Prof. Chris J. Maddison and Prof. Jimmy Ba. I have graduated from IIIS, Tsinghua University (YaoClass) in 2019, major in computer science.

docs.title: Research Interests
docs.text:
My current research interest is in developing Language Model Agents.

I am broadly interested in artificial intelligence and have also worked on various topics including Reasoning, Graph Neural Networks, Reinforcement Learning and Computer Vision.

docs.title: Experiences
docs.text:
• I have won Gold Medal in The 26th International Olympiad in Informatics (IOI2014).
  • I have participated in ACM-ICPC 2016 World Finals as a team member.
  • I have interned in Megvii Inc. (Face++), Google China AI Center, Google (Beijing) and Tencent Inc. I am currently a research intern at Sierra.
  • I have visited University of Southern California (adviced by Joseph Lim), University of California, Berkeley (adviced by Stuart Russell) and University of Toronto (adviced by Jimmy Ba).

docs.title: Services
docs.text: • I have served as a reviewer for conferences including NeurIPS, ICLR and ICML.
